Class Utilities

extends java.lang.Object

                                               double dist,
                                               double theta)
        Polar Point.
        Parameters:
        base - The base Point
        dist - Polar distance
        theta - Polar angle
        Returns:

      • lengthenLine

        public static java.awt.geom.Line2D lengthenLine(java.awt.geom.Point2D sp,
                                                java.awt.geom.Point2D ep,
                                                double dist,
                                                boolean start)
        Lengthen a line. Project a distance from the end or start point. This will lengthen (or shorten with negative distance) a line a relative distance.
        Parameters:
        sp - Start point of the Line.
        ep - End point of the Line
        dist - The distance to project the line (relative lengthen/shorten).
        start - True if project off of start point, false projects off of end point.
        Returns:
        The lengthened (or shortened) line.

      • offsetLine

        public static java.awt.geom.Line2D offsetLine(java.awt.geom.Line2D line,
                                              double startDist,
                                              double endDist,
                                              boolean left)
        Offset a line. Creates offset lines to the given line. This can create a parallel shape if start and end distances are the same, or a tapered shape (rear triangle) if different distances are given.
        Parameters:
        line - The line to offset.
        startDist - The start distance to offset.
        endDist - The end distance to offset.
        left - True to offset to left side (defined by start point to end), false to offset to right side.
        Returns:
        The offset line.

      • addPoints

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D addPoints(java.awt.geom.Point2D a,
                                              java.awt.geom.Point2D b)
        Add two points
        Parameters:
        a - Point a.
        b - Point b.
        Returns:
        The result of adding the points.

      • trimLineToLine

        public static java.awt.geom.Line2D trimLineToLine(java.awt.geom.Line2D line,
                                                  java.awt.geom.Line2D trim,
                                                  boolean start)
        Trim a line by a line. Calculates the intersection of two lines, and trims the first line to the intersection point. Either the start point or end point is preserved based on the flag for start.
        Parameters:
        line - Line to trim.
        trim - Line to trim to.
        start - True to keep the start point, false to keep the end point.
        Returns:
        The trimmed line.

      • trimLineToCircle

        public static java.awt.geom.Line2D trimLineToCircle(java.awt.geom.Line2D line,
                                                    java.awt.geom.Point2D center,
                                                    double radius,
                                                    boolean start)
        Trim a line to a circle. Preserves the line direction.
        Parameters:
        line - The line to trim.
        center - Center of circle.
        radius - Radius of circle.
        start - True to keep line start point, false to keep line end point.
        Returns:
        The trimmed line or a copy of the same line if trim fails.

      • vectorAngle

        public static double vectorAngle(java.awt.geom.Point2D basePoint,
                                 java.awt.geom.Point2D pointA,
                                 java.awt.geom.Point2D pointB)
        Vector angle. Constructs two vectors from the 3 points and calculates the angle between them.
        Parameters:
        basePoint - Base point.
        pointA - The first point (end point of first vector).
        pointB - The second point (end point of second vector).
        Returns:
        The angle between the vectors

      • circleCircleIntersection

        public static IntersectionPoint circleCircleIntersection(java.awt.geom.Point2D c0,
                                                         double r0,
                                                         java.awt.geom.Point2D c1,
                                                         double r1)
        Get the Circle Circle intersection Code derived from example on Paul Bourke's website: http://paulbourke.net/geometry/circlesphere/ (Intersection of two circles) Derived from example by Jonathan Greig: "Contribution from Jonathan Greig." http://paulbourke.net/geometry/circlesphere/tangentpointtocircle.zip
        Parameters:
        c0 - Circle 0 center point.
        r0 - Circle 0 radius.
        c1 - Circle 1 center point.
        r1 - Circle 1 radius.
        Returns:
        The intersection point.

      • lineLineIntersect

        public static IntersectionPoint lineLineIntersect(java.awt.geom.Line2D l1,
                                                  java.awt.geom.Line2D l2)
        Line Line intersection wrapper for two lines. This uses the pint version for the calculation.
        Parameters:
        l1 - The first line for the intersection.
        l2 - The second line for the intersection.
        Returns:
        The result of the intersection calculation.

      • lineLineIntersect

        public static IntersectionPoint lineLineIntersect(java.awt.geom.Point2D s1,
                                                  java.awt.geom.Point2D e1,
                                                  java.awt.geom.Point2D s2,
                                                  java.awt.geom.Point2D e2)
        Line Line Intersection using Point2d class. Code derived from example Paul Bourke's website: http://paulbourke.net/geometry/pointlineplane/ (Intersection point of two line segments in 2 dimensions) Derived from example by Paul Bourke: "Original C code by Paul Bourke" http://paulbourke.net/geometry/pointlineplane/pdb.c
        Parameters:
        s1 - Line 1 start point.
        e1 - Line 1 end point.
        s2 - Line 2 start point.
        e2 - Line 2 end point.
        Returns:
        IntersectionPoint with either the solution (intersection point) or failure flag set.

      • lineCircleIntersect

        public static IntersectionPoint lineCircleIntersect(java.awt.geom.Point2D sp,
                                                    java.awt.geom.Point2D ep,
                                                    java.awt.geom.Point2D cp,
                                                    double radius)
        Line Circle Intersection Code derived from example Paul Bourke's website: http://paulbourke.net/geometry/circlesphere/ (Intersection of a Line and a Sphere (or circle)) Derived from example by Iebele Abel. "Source code example by Iebele Abel." http://paulbourke.net/geometry/circlesphere/source.cpp
        Parameters:
        sp - Line start point.
        ep - Line end point.
        cp - Circle center point.
        radius - Circle radius.
        Returns:
        Intersection result with intersection points if there was a solution.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
